alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Assumption; St. James (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 5:06PM CDT until July 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Assumption Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 506 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gonzales, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Sorrento, Paincourtville, Geismar and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 174 and 186. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
